mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over(order by w.idWISHLIST_TB desc) as num, w.MEMBER_TB_IDX, w.idWISHLIST_TB, w.PRODUCT_TB_IDX, p.PROD_IDX, p.PROD_NAME, p.PROD_PRICE, p.PROD_OPT, p.PROD_IMGT from wishlist_tb w inner join product_tb p on w.PRODUCT_TB_IDX = p.PROD_IDX where w.MEMBER_TB_IDX = #{MEMBER_TB_IDX}
